name: Space Blaster 2D
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project for Coursera. I added the following elements:

  1. Original soundtrack of chiptune/8-bit covers of popular songs by Muse, Linkin Park and a surprise guest artist (see if you can find out who)!
  2. Overhauled and redisgned the UI, inlcuding adding buttons to the gameplay screen to turn the music on and off and to pause the game
  3. Redesigned and added new sprites (including animations) for enemy ships, added mini bosses and big bosses with varying health levels and also flying asteroids
  4. There are 3 levels and you can select whichever one you want to play by going to the main menu

Credits

Resources from Brian Winn

Created by Kerry Pain
